version: Cisco Cloud Controls Framework (CCF) Public Release V2.0+++
description: Matrice di mappatura (Cisco Common Control Framework) che associa i controlli interni a standard esterni (ISO, BSI C5, NIST, PCI, ecc.). Non definisce controlli ma associa controlli provenienti da diversi schemi
Associations with external schemes:
SOC TSC Common Criteria
SOC TSC Availability
SOC TSC Confidentiality
SOC TSC Privacy
ISO 27001 ISMS
ISO 27002: 2013 Annex A
Cloud Service Customers ISO 27017
Cloud Service Providers ISO 27017
ISO 27018
PII Controller ISO 27701
PII Processor ISO 27701
ISO 22301
BSI C5
FedRAMP Tailored Control
Spanish ENS BASIC Control
Spanish ENS Medium Control
Spanish ENS High Control
ISMAP Control
PCI Control
Saudi CCC Control
EU Code of Conduct Control
NIST SP 800-171 Control
EUCS Basic Control
EUCS Substantial Control
EUCS High Control
SecNumCloud Control
IRAP Control

description: Last version of control mapped sended by Iñaki via mail. This file is a control mapping matrix. It maps controls from the EUCS (European Union Cybersecurity Scheme) to their equivalent controls in other standards, specifically Germany's BSI C5, France's SecNumCloud, ISO 27002, and ISO 27017.
Associations with external schemes:
BSI C5: OIS-04
SecNumCloud: 6.1 e 6.2
ISO 27002: 5.3
ISO 27017: CLD.6.3.1

description: Spanish ENS parsed with python script from original pdf. Spell check corrected manually. Chck the code inside 'Other/pdfFilesAndParsers/spanishENS/spanishENSPdfExtractor.ipynb'. This file is a control catalog for the Spanish Esquema Nacional de Seguridad (ENS). It is not a mapping file; it simply lists each control ID (e.g., org.1.1, op.pl.1.1) and provides its official description.
BSI-C5 controls without association, only associated with their own ID. Obtained through admin/admin authentication.

French SecNumCloud parsed with python script from original pdf. Translated with google translator APIs. Chck the code inside 'Other/pdfFilesAndParsers/secNumCloud/secnumcloud-referentiel-exigences-v3.2.ipynb'
Official metric repository, association not present yet. The script to generate one csv file with all the association is inside ‘Other/RepoMetricsScript/oneCsvFileGenerator.ipynb’
Data from excel file on the fabsasoft repository (excel file)
